Question: This person named his new theory the Oedipus complex after the famous Greek tragedy Oedipus Rex by Sophocles.
Hints: This person spent most of his life in Vienna.
Three days after his death, this person's body was cremated at the Golders Green Crematorium in North London.
This person acknowledged that his use of the term Id (das Es, "the It") derives from the writings of Georg Groddeck.
